entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 11:00 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 8:49 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:49 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 8:49 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
